verses.verse: <S%H480>Woe<s%> is me! For I <S%H1961>am<s%> Like the <S%H7019>fruit<s%> <S%H625>pickers<s%> and the <S%H1210>grape<s%> <S%H5955>gatherers.<s%> <S%H369>There<s%> is not a <S%H811>cluster<s%> of grapes to <S%H398>eat,<s%> [Or] a first-ripe <S%H1063>fig<s%> [which] I <S%H183>crave.<s%>

The <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H2623>person<s%> has perished from the <S%H6>land,<s%> And <S%H776>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>upright<s%> [person] among <S%H3477>men.<s%> <S%H120>All<s%> of them <S%H3605>lie<s%> in <S%H693>wait<s%> for <S%H693>bloodshed;<s%> <S%H1818>Each<s%> of them <S%H376>hunts<s%> the <S%H6679>other<s%> with a <S%H251>net.<s%>

<S%H5921>Concerning<s%> <S%H9563>evil,<s%> both <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H3190>do<s%> it <S%H3190>well.<s%> The <S%H8269>prince<s%> <S%H7592>asks,<s%> also the <S%H8199>judge,<s%> for a <S%H7966>bribe,<s%> And a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1419>man<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> the <S%H1942>desire<s%> of his <S%H5315>soul;<s%> So they <S%H5686>weave<s%> it <S%H5686>together.<s%>

The <S%H2896>best<s%> of them is like a <S%H2312>briar,<s%> The most <S%H3477>upright<s%> like a <S%H4534>thorn<s%> <S%H4534>hedge.<s%> The <S%H3117>day<s%> when you post a <S%H6822>watchman,<s%> Your <S%H6486>punishment<s%> will <S%H935>come.<s%> <S%H6258>Then<s%> their <S%H3998>confusion<s%> will <S%H1961>occur.<s%>

Do not <S%H982>trust<s%> in a <S%H7453>neighbor;<s%> Do not <S%H982>have<s%> <S%H982>confidence<s%> in a <S%H7453>friend.<s%> From her who <S%H7901>lies<s%> in your <S%H2436>bosom<s%> <S%H8104>Guard<s%> your <S%H6310>lips.<s%>

For <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H9310>treats<s%> father <S%H1>contemptuously,<s%> <S%H9310>Daughter<s%> <S%H1323>rises<s%> up against her <S%H6965>mother,<s%> Daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law; A man's <S%H517>enemies<s%> are the <S%H340>men<s%> of his own <S%H376>household.<s%>

But as for me, I will <S%H6822>watch<s%> <S%H6822>expectantly<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> I will <S%H3176>wait<s%> for the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation.<s%> My <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H8085>hear<s%> me.

Do not <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> over me, O my <S%H340>enemy.<s%> <S%H3588>Though<s%> I <S%H5307>fall<s%> I will <S%H6965>rise;<s%> <S%H3588>Though<s%> I <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is a <S%H216>light<s%> for me.

I will <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H2197>indignation<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against Him, <S%H5704>Until<s%> <S%H834><s%> He <S%H7378>pleads<s%> my <S%H7379>case<s%> and <S%H6213>executes<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> for me. He will <S%H3318>bring<s%> me out to the <S%H216>light,<s%> [And] I will <S%H7200>see<s%> His <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

Then my <S%H340>enemy<s%> will <S%H7200>see,<s%> And <S%H955>shame<s%> will <S%H3680>cover<s%> her who <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H335>"Where<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>?" My <S%H5869>eyes<s%> will <S%H7200>look<s%> on her; At that <S%H6258>time<s%> she will be <S%H4823>trampled<s%> <S%H4823>down,<s%> Like <S%H2916>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets.<s%>
[It will be] a <S%H3117>day<s%> for <S%H1129>building<s%> your <S%H1447>walls.<s%> On that <S%H3117>day<s%> will your <S%H2706>boundary<s%> be <S%H7368>extended.<s%>

It [will be] a <S%H3117>day<s%> when they will <S%H935>come<s%> to you From <S%H804>Assyria<s%> and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4693>Egypt,<s%> From <S%H4693>Egypt<s%> even to the <S%H5104>Euphrates,<s%> Even from <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H3220>sea<s%> and <S%H2022>mountain<s%> to <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

And the <S%H776>earth<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of her <S%H3427>inhabitants,<s%> On <S%H4480>account<s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of their <S%H4611>deeds.<s%>

<S%H7462>Shepherd<s%> Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> with Thy <S%H7626>scepter,<s%> The <S%H6629>flock<s%> of Thy <S%H5159>possession<s%> Which <S%H7931>dwells<s%> by <S%H910>itself<s%> in the <S%H3293>woodland,<s%> In the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of a <S%H3759>fruitful<s%> <S%H3759>field.<s%> Let them <S%H7462>feed<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> and <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> As in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old.<s%>
"As in the <S%H3117>days<s%> when you <S%H3318>came<s%> out from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> I will <S%H7200>show<s%> you <S%H6381>miracles.<s%>"

<S%H1471>Nations<s%> will <S%H7200>see<s%> and be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> Of <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H1369>might.<s%> They will <S%H7760>put<s%> [their] <S%H3027>hand<s%> on [their] <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> Their <S%H241>ears<s%> will be <S%H2790>deaf.<s%>

They will <S%H3897>lick<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> like a <S%H5175>serpent,<s%> Like <S%H9102>reptiles<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> They will <S%H7264>come<s%> <S%H7264>trembling<s%> out of their <S%H4526>fortresses;<s%> To the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> they will <S%H6342>come<s%> in <S%H6342>dread,<s%> And they will be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> Thee.

<S%H4310>Who<s%> is a <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> Thee, who <S%H5375>pardons<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> And <S%H5674>passes<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6588>rebellious<s%> <S%H6588>act<s%> of the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of His <S%H5159>possession<s%>? He does not <S%H2388>retain<s%> His <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H5703>forever,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> He <S%H2654>delights<s%> in <S%H2617>unchanging<s%> <S%H2617>love.<s%>

He will <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7355>have<s%> <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on us; He will <S%H3533>tread<s%> our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> <S%H3533>under<s%> <S%H3533>foot.<s%> Yes, Thou wilt <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H9128>sins<s%> Into the <S%H4688>depths<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

Thou wilt <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H571>truth<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> [And] <S%H2617>unchanging<s%> <S%H2617>love<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H834>Which<s%> Thou didst <S%H7650>swear<s%> to our forefathers From the <S%H1>days<s%> of <S%H3117>old.<s%>
